results.title: Rex Tillerson Out as Trump’s Secretary of State, Replaced by Mike Pompeo

results.title: Replacing Tillerson With Pompeo Would Supplant a Moderate With a Hawk
results.abstract: The views of Mike Pompeo, the C.I.A. director, have put him in good stead with President Trump, who has come to value his pungent opinions and hard-charging style.

results.title: Review: Paul Taylor Classics Outshine New Dances (His and Others’)
results.abstract: “Concertiana,” Mr. Taylor’s 147th work, received a premiere along with “The Beauty in Gray” by Bryan Arias and “Half Life” by Doug Varone.

multimedia.caption: Alex Clayton performing in the premiere of “Concertiana” with fellow members of Paul Taylor American Modern Dance.

results.title: Near Noisy Oil Fields, Lovesick Birds Change Their Tunes
results.abstract: “Hey, hey, sexy, hey, I’m Bob, a Savannah sparrow.” Birds near oil fields tweak their mating calls in complex ways that researchers are only starting to grasp.

multimedia.caption: A male Savannah sparrow in prairie sagebrush near Brooks, Alberta.

results.title: Congress Quashed Research Into Gun Violence. Since Then, 600,000 People Have Been Shot.
results.abstract: Why do so many Americans kill one another, and how can the violence be stopped? The C.D.C. quit studying these and other questions over 20 years ago.
org_facet: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

multimedia.caption: Federal officials and lawmakers debate whether to relax restrictions, backed by the National Rifle Association, on governmental research into gun violence.

results.title: A Newly Discovered Difference Between Alligators and Crocodiles
results.abstract: Many differences between the two reptiles center on their heads and mouths, but researchers in Japan have found features in their limbs that set them apart.

multimedia.caption: The most obvious way to tell a crocodile, left, from an alligator, is from their snouts: Those of alligators are wider and shorter, and crocodiles’ top and bottom teeth are interlaced and visible when their mouths are closed.
multimedia.copyright: Left, wickedmrb; Right, Tim Donovan/Florida Fish and Wildlife Service

results.title: Teenagers Are Sexting — Now What?
results.abstract: Experts say parents should acknowledge sexting as an aspect of teen relationships and include it in conversations about safety and respect.
